problem.title: The Problem
problem.subtitle: Why small online shops need AI automation
problem.intro: Small and medium online shops face growing challenges: customers expect fast 24/7 support, accounting consumes valuable time, and personnel costs keep rising. Meanwhile, they lack the resources of large corporations.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Service
support.description: Customers expect instant answers — even at 11 PM. Small shops can't afford a round-the-clock support team. Dissatisfied customers switch to competitors.

accounting.title: Manual Accounting
accounting.description: Writing invoices, booking payments, sending reminders — all of this costs hours per week and is error-prone. Small shops don't have a dedicated accountant.

scaling.title: Growth Without Extra Costs
scaling.description: More orders mean more support requests and more accounting work. Staff doesn't scale linearly — AI does.

problem.conclusion: ShopControl AI solves exactly these problems: A fully autonomous AI agent handles customer service while accounting runs automatically in the background.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.subtitle: Two AI pillars for the modern online shop
solution.intro: ShopControl AI combines two powerful automation systems in one solution: an intelligent support agent and fully automatic accounting.

support.title: AI Support Agent
support.description: A fully autonomous chatbot that instantly answers customer inquiries about orders, products, and returns — with access to real-time shop data via Shopify.

technology.title: Technology
technology.subtitle: How ShopControl AI works under the hood
technology.overview: ShopControl AI is built on n8n workflows that orchestrate two main systems: an AI support agent with RAG knowledge retrieval and fully automatic accounting. Here we show step by step how each request is processed.

step1.title: Receive Customer Request
step1.description: A message arrives via the chat widget or email. The n8n trigger automatically starts the support workflow and routes the request to the AI agent.

step2.title: AI Agent Analyzes
step2.description: The GPT-4-based agent analyzes the customer request, understands the context, and autonomously decides which tool or sub-agent is needed to answer the question.

step3.title: RAG Knowledge Query
step3.description: When shop-specific knowledge is needed, the agent searches the Pinecone vector database. Relevant documents like FAQs, product descriptions, and policies are provided as context.

step4.title: Shopify Data Query
step4.description: For questions about orders, products, or customer data, the agent activates the Shopify sub-agent, which accesses the shop API in real time to retrieve current data.

step5.title: Generate Response
step5.description: Based on all collected data — RAG documents, Shopify data, and conversation history — the agent formulates a personalized, precise answer for the customer.

step6.title: Automatic Accounting
step6.description: In parallel with support, automatic accounting runs: invoices are created, generated as PDFs, sent via email, and logged in Google Sheets — completely without manual intervention.

rag.title: RAG System
rag.subtitle: Retrieval-Augmented Generation in Detail
rag.description: RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) enables the AI agent to access shop-specific knowledge. Documents like FAQs, product catalogs, and return policies are converted into vectors and stored in Pinecone. With each request, the most relevant text passages are automatically found and provided to the agent as context.
